Thank you for completing your registration. We've sent an email to the address you provided to confirm that you are the person who wishes to register.
To complete the process and complete the last step of registration, please follow the link we sent to your email.
If you don't see the email in your inbox, please also check your spam or junk folder.
Thank you for registering and welcome!

privacy-polity.title: SHUK Terms and Conditions
privacy-polity.a proteccion: We comply with the Organic Law on Personal Data Protection and other applicable regulations in Ecuador. We only collect necessary information, handle it confidentially, and use it solely with your consent for specific purposes.
privacy-polity.b proteccion: You have the right to access, rectify, or delete your data.
privacy-polity.parrafo requisitos: Our site is intended exclusively for individuals over 18 years old. By using SHUK, you confirm that you are of legal age to access motivational and personal development content.
privacy-polity.a seg tec: Secure browsing with HTTPS and TLS encryption
privacy-polity.b seg tec: Administrative access protected with strong passwords.
privacy-polity.c seg tec: Protection against common attacks (XSS, CSRF, injections)
privacy-polity.parrafo sesiones: Sessions expire after prolonged inactivity to protect your account
privacy-polity.a transparencia: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties
privacy-polity.b transparencia: You can consult our Privacy Policy at any time
privacy-polity.c transparencia: In case of a data breach, you will be promptly notified
privacy-polity.a modificadores: The SHUK platform reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate services at any time without prior notice.
privacy-polity.b modificadores: Users will be notified of any changes to the privacy policies through the SHUK platform and electronic means.
